text:
Use of Information we collect

Digital Space Explorer, Inc. through our Squadzip platform and as a result of a subscription agreement with our enterprise customers, collects your full name along with your corporate contact information - your corporate email, designation and corporate contact number.
We may disclose personally identifiable information under special circumstances, such as to comply with subpoenas or when your actions violate the Terms of Service.

This privacy policy describes how Squadzip collects and uses the personal and corporate information you provide us and it also describes the choices available to you regarding our use of your personal information and how you can access and update this information.
